item.description:
Please join the Sierra Club for a Midsummer BBQ Meetup!

Tuesday, August 7, 2007, 5:30-7:00pm
Jamaica Plain Co-housing
65 Cornwall Street, Boston 02130
http://www.jpcohousin...

Just an 8-minute walk from the Orange Line's "Green Street Station." On-street parking is available but very limited and co-housing encourages you to take public transit.

HOSTED BY:
David Heimann
Chapter Chair, Massachusetts Sierra Club

COST:
Bring a dish for the potluck -OR- bring $5 person.

RSVP:
Yes - RSVPs are required. Because of limited space, we need to ask everyone to RSVP!

This is a great way for you to find out about our Sierra club events and to meet other members. While you're there, join us for cold beverages, meet new people, find out how you can contribute to the good fight for our environment. This meeting - opens to all - will have Sierra Club activists who will explain the projects were working on, from Alternative Energy, Politics, Legislation, Outings, Parks, plus many other Sierra Club subjects. Please feel free to call me at 617-218-7794 for any questions. My name is Rajeev.

When and Where:
Tuesday, August 7, 2007 at 5:30 PM
Jamaica Plain Cohousing-- 65 Cornwall Street , Boston Massachusetts 02130
http://www.jpcohousin...

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Midsummer BBQ Meetup!
